title: Poster, "NEXT, The Sign of the NeXt generation of computers... for education", 1986
inscribed: Imprinted in lower center, in orange:  The sign of/ in black:  the NeXT generation/ in green:  of computers.../in pink:  for Education.
description: On a white ground, the logo of the NeXT corporation.  An axonometric image of a black cube, composed of a square and two parallelograms.  Imprinted on the top of the cube (in the black square) are four letters of the corportion in orange, yellow, green, and pink, respectively, N E over X T.  Beneath the cube, in lower center, in orange:  The sign of; in black:  the NeXT generation; in green:  of computers...; in pink:  for Education.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, "NEXT, The Sign of the NeXt generation of computers... for education", 1986.
1986. Offset lithograph. Gift of Marion S. Rand. 2002-11-16.
